name: GetBoardTextItem
description:
Fetches details of a text item from a Miro board.

This tool retrieves information for a specific text item on a Miro board using the board and item IDs. It requires 'boards:read' access.

parameters.name: board_unique_id
parameters.description: Unique ID of the board to retrieve a specific text item.

value_schema.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the board from which you want to retrieve a specific item.

parameters.name: item_identifier
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the text item you want to retrieve from the board.

value_schema.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the item that you want to retrieve.
